commit.message:
release 1.2.0 (#85)

* IESI-192 fix jest tests
* IESI-190: Fix not being able to view an execution thats in progress
* IESI-193: Truncate long filter input
* [IESI-195] only show icon if known status + add running status
* IESI-191: Change when execution request finished popup is shown
* add script execution status to execution overview screen (#20)
* mark download script as an IESI api call (#23)
* create the logon page (#24)
* handle failed login attempt with a alert popup (#35)
* add security group to information details in script overview screen (#33)
* add security group to information details in script details screen (#34)
* allow users to only perform actions based on their roles (#26)
* navigation from execution details of a script to script details (#29)
* 'go to details' button should be on 1 line and on the same level as 'go to parent script' (#40)
* update number of an action to actual index in the list on screen (#41)
* take into account discard changes during script design (#38)
* enable 'action expected to fail' checkbox for SCRIPT_WRITE privilege (#42)
* Allow OpenAPI documentation to IESI configuration transformation (#52)
* add requestor to execution details of script execution (#54)
* add basic component views (#53)
* create basic connection screens (#57)
* mark requestor as anonymous when not present in execution request (#58)
* add duplicate action functionality (#60)
* add missing translation for component details (#70)
* add Dockerfile (#81)
* add github action triggering azure pipeline (#80)
* remove underline in connection detail dropdown for type (#73)

Co-authored-by: Maxim Coppieters <m.coppieters@accenture.com>
Co-authored-by: Dries Beerten <dries.beerten@kunstmaan.be>
Co-authored-by: vdwjeff <vdwjeff@gmail.com>
Co-authored-by: Ouamar <tawbane.ouamar@accenture.com>
Co-authored-by: TawbaneAcc <73652675+TawbaneAcc@users.noreply.github.com>
Co-authored-by: hkhattabii <54418529+hkhattabii@users.noreply.github.com>
Co-authored-by: Suyash-d <81413098+Suyash-d@users.noreply.github.com>
Co-authored-by: Robbe Berrevoets <robbeberrevoets@accenture.com>
Co-authored-by: ranzila <86262828+ranzila@users.noreply.github.com>
